item.title: Sharon add a quote by Jackie Robinson
item.description: "A life is not important except in the impact it has on other lives." -- Jackie Robinson

item.title: Sharon add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us." -- Helen Keller

item.title: Sharon add a quote by Helen Keller
item.description: "Alone we can do so little; together we can do so much" -- Helen Keller

item.title: Sharon add a quote by Michael jordan
item.description: "I've missed more than 9000 shots in my career. I've lost almost 300 games. 26 times, I've been trusted to take the game winning shot and missed. I've failed over and over and over again in my life. And that is why I succeed." -- Michael jordan

item.title: Sharon add a quote by Michael Jordan
item.description: "Some people want it to happen, some wish it would happen, and others make it happen." -- Michael Jordan

item.title: Sharon add a quote by J.K. Rowling
item.description: "Remember, if the time should come when you have to make a choice between what is right and what is easy, remember what happened to a boy who was good, and kind, and brave, because he strayed across the path of Lord Voldemort. Remember Cedric Diggory." -- J.K. Rowling
